description: Try our easy to follow Salmon With Fennel & Tomatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Salmon With Fennel & Tomatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 700-1000g salmon fillets, about 4 x 175-250 g each

recipeInstructions.text: Season the salmon fillets generously with salt and pepper and pour over the lemon juice. Set aside.

Combine the oil, vinegar, honey, garlic and salt and pepper to taste in a small bowl. Put the onions, fennel and tomatoes in a large bowl and pour over the oil mixture. Toss to coat thoroughly, then spread out on a baking sheet.
Roast in a preheated oven, 220°C, Gas Mark 7, for 10 minutes. Add the salmon fillets to the baking sheet and roast for a further 12-15 minutes.
Serve the salmon with the roasted vegetables and rice or couscous.
